item.description:
Â 

We will Camp at the Cozy Pond Camping Resort and then go to the Balloon Festival on Saturday. Join us for the weekend or come for the day. Cost for camping is $38/night per site. Day visitors; Adults $5, Children $2. If you are camping call to reserve your site, don't forget to mention this meetup group. Go to their website, give them a call @ 603.428.7701 or email Joe at joe@cozypond.com to reserve your site ASAP. He has a group area for us E4-25 but will not be able to hold them for long if other groups start calling to reserve. There is a pond to swim and boat in as well as a mini-golf area.


Hillsborough Balloon Festival and Fair is a major four day event. The fair was created by merging the former Hillsborough Firemen's Weekend and Hillsborough Balloon Festival.

The Hillsborough Balloon Festival and Fair is now sponsored by the Hillsborough Civic Organization, comprised of the three original local groups, the Hillsborough Fire Department, Hillsborough Lions Club, and the Hillsborough Chamber of Commerce. Go HERE to see their website.
item.how_to_find_us: I am on site E4 or call Joan at 603-305-7114
item.name: Hillsborough Balloon Festival, Fair & Camping
